name: Back For Paper
description:
Game Dev Quote

Hello Neighbor inspired Game, try to Beat it before i Beat  hug You!

Controls Are Simple

WASD or ↑↓→ ←to Move

"E" to Interact

Game Info

Survival Horror Game, Hard to Learn, Easy to Master.

Game Description

The Game is About Timmy, Timmy has been sent out to do his paper route by his mom, but when he comes back home, his mom isn't alone.

Credits

Unity and Programming: Just Burger 'N Stuff

Art: "Blender" Just Burger 'N Stuff

GameDev video will come out soon, make sure to check it out when it does:
